descriptionHtml:
Save game for my pretty hot Nord female - short blonde

Pls ENDORSE me, if U like it, THX! ;)

One save from the beginning & the second from Whiterun on LvL5, with only already just a few side quests. ;)

Install:
---------------
You need put, extract files into your save folder, default location is:

 C:\\Users\\Username\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves (click \'yes to overwrite\' if needed or rename the numbers of this save file)


to get this look also you need the following character mods: 
----------------

1 Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente   (This is a nice NUDE mod, so available only over age of 18!)

(Exacly this versions!!!   Calientes_Female_Body_Mod_BBE_v0_2-2666-0-2a     

& after activate this Caliente_Body_Shaved_Texture-2666-0-1

Otherwise You can get only different, so not the same character results.)  

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666



2 Beauty Faces for females by necKros

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1329



3 Coolsims Hair Pack by newermind43

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809





Sy, but I use many-many mods so maybe for the exactly same results U also need this:

4 Better Females by Bella by BellaGail

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
